author: tkstanczak
content: Hi everyone, we have been setting up GitHub actions which were including git-lfs checkouts and I think the eth2-spec-tests repo hit a quota. Do you know how to avoid it / whether it will be refreshed.

author: tkstanczak
content: Error downloading object: tests/general/phase0/bls/aggregate_pubkeys/small/agg_pub_keys/data.yaml (4326107): Smudge error: Error downloading tests/general/phase0/bls/aggregate_pubkeys/small/agg_pub_keys/data.yaml (43261076953467bb2f289efc4c43412f8923ed3696d686ad4f65905a429e16cc): batch response: This repository is over its data quota. Account responsible for LFS bandwidth should purchase more data packs to restore access.

author: mpetrunic
content: use tar archive in release section instead of cloning amd lfs pulling

author: tkstanczak
content: was not aware of the tar - it makes sense
